```{r}
intercept=c(8.8927, 8.9001, 8.821, 8.9570, 8.8362, 8.9580,8.9402 )

intercept2=c(2.562, 2.495 ,3.246*10^(-4), 8.839*10^(-5),3.16*10^(-4) , 8.559*10^(-5), 2.9282*10^(-4))

perc=function(a, b){
  out=(a-b)/a
  return(out)
}

perc.vec=function(vec){
  l=length(vec)
  m=matrix(NA, nrow = l, ncol = l)
  for(i in 1:l){
    for(j in 1:l)
    {
      m[i,j]=perc(vec[i], vec[j])
    }
  }
  return(m)
}

inter=perc.vec(intercept2)
inter=as.matrix(round(inter, 4))
inter
```
